For the purpose of this conversation, we want to create a space across the city to facilitate more constructive listening across neighborhoods and communities, and build on an ecosystem of listening where every community member's story contributes to our shared understanding and a stronger, more inclusive Boston. So, to achieve this goal, we invite you to engage in a new kind of conversation, one centered on sharing personal stories from our own lives and experiences, rather than beginning the conversation with our positions on issues. And this approach aims to help build connections and facilitate conversations that deepen mutual understanding.
